name: Eggcellent Breakfast Pizza
description: Pizza alla Bismark, or cooked egg on pizza, is a delicious Italian tradition — a good excuse to have pizza for breakfast!

ingredients.name: grated Parmesan cheese or pecorino cheese

preparation: Place shell on a crisper and spread evenly with sauce, leaving a 1⁄2" border around edge. Sprinkle with dip mix and arrange tomato and peppers on top.

Bake until shell starts to brown, about 8–10 minutes. Remove from oven and crack eggs on top. Sprinkle with cheese and continue to bake for about 5 minutes, until eggs are set but yolks are still runny. Slice and top with greens prior to serving.
tips: Make vegan: Swap eggs for tofu and use soy or another dairy-free cheese.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup 2% plain Greek yogurt and 1⁄2 cup mixed berries.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!
